title: Which B.Sc. branch is easy to study? - Quora

response.answer_text: None should be easy or they are not worth doing, I have a PhD in Statistics but there were parts of my BSc that I found difficult and I rarely got 100% in coursework. There are some people that find a BSc easy but they are few and far between, even fewer find postgraduate study easy. I have heard stories that imply that Stephen Hawking found both easy but you never know what is hype.
